title: Instant catapult steam explosion combined with ammonia water: A complex technology for detoxification of aflatoxin-contaminated peanut cake with the aim of producing a toxicity-free and nutrients retention of animal feed
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Hui Xie, Lei Gao, Zhimin Li, Guotao Mao, Hongsen Zhang, Fengqin Wang, Su Shiung Lam, Andong Song
